FuncDef: For operational efficiency, the operational rate of a policer cannot take on every value in the configurable range. This configuration defines a rule that must be followed when mapping a configured rate to an operational rate.

ParaDef.Info: Configures the rules to compute the PIR operational rates. Values-min - Specifies that the operational rate must minimally be the configured rate. The first operational value bigger or equal to the configured rate is chosen..
Configures the rules to compute the CIR operational rates. Values-adaptation-rule.

ExtraInfo: Default: adaptation-rule pir closest cir closest
